law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 419, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 29.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Substances and property, subject to forfeiture -- Procedure and exemptions.
